import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Movie } from '../../templates' const MovieRemove = () => { const [mov_id, setMovid] = useState('') const del = () => { alert(`DELETE MOVIE ID : ${mov_id}`) axios.delete(`http://127.0.0.1:8080/api/movie/${mov_id}`,{'mov_id':mov_id}) .then(res => { alert(`DELETE SUCCESS`) }) .catch(e => { alert(`DELETE FAIL ${e}`) }) } return (

MovieRemove

MOVIEID setMovid(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default MovieRemove
